title: 20 years of the Apple iPod and how it changed the world
content:
When someones says iPod, many thoughts cross our minds. The iPod isn’t just an MP3 player from Apple. It’s an iconic legacy that redefined how broad the limits could be on a compact device. Not only did it blow us away, but it also changed how we consume music — especially when on the go.

The post 20 years of the Apple iPod and how it changed the world appeared first on XDA.
description: Apple revealed the first iPod back in 2001, forever changing the way people listen to music. Now the company has discontinued the lineup.
